name: places/ChIJ1TMY47dZwokRavyJL6P51WE
formattedAddress: 610 W 58th St 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 610 W 58th St 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Good Doctor, but I had trouble reaching their front office through the telephone system / contact is strange and I had to figure out how where to go for an MRI by myself but luckily it all worked out. I would just caution to obtain all the information you need before you leave because I haven't heard from them at all. Maybe it's because I haven't done stuff through their website... either way, I find it a bit strange that I haven't received a single text or anything telling me where to go for my MRI and i have to find a location by myself and ask them to call the this clinic because I couldnt get a hold of the clinic myself and I tried for days and left messaged/asked to call back. I'm not sure where I went wrong there but overall the experience at the clinic itself is super efficient and the doctor seemed super study ways and humble and explained everything so I trust cause I enjoyed the experience and I probably just missed something

originalText.text: I have tried to follow up with him for now over 2 weeks. His staff keep saying they will follow up with him. But I don’t get any answer. I tried messaging him in the HSS app but still no response.  Poor customer service.

text.text: I have tried to follow up with him for now over 2 weeks. His staff keep saying they will follow up with him. But I don’t get any answer. I tried messaging him in the HSS app but still no response.  Poor customer service.

originalText.text: I highly disagree with that 1 star review. Dr. Dixit was efficient and highly skilled. My entire experience with Dr. Dixit at HSS was exceptional.
